data.text:

urls.title: Missing or damaged baggage | Air France
urls.description: Air France tells you the steps you need to take if your baggage was not returned to you. Your baggage was damaged during a flight? Air France advises you and keeps you up-to-date

data.text:
@andrewarti19 2/2 For further information please read the section ‘What To Do If Your Baggage Is Not Found’ here on our website: https://t.co/oAftyeJQR7. 

You can also contact our baggage service team at https://t.co/bmLoCulyWa . Let us know if you have further queries.
